description.db:para: This table is used by the Rate Cacher module to keep track of the accounts - the inbound side of the traffic. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;rate_cacher.html.

column.name: id
column.description: Table primary key, not used by module

column.name: account_id
column.description: Account unique ID - used to link the GW from

column.name: wholesale_rate
column.description: Wholesale Rate used for this account

column.name: retail_rate
column.description: Retail Rate used for this account
